heading: When is mango season in Malihabad?
answer: The season usually starts in mid-May and lasts till early July.

heading: How do I place an order
answer: Go to our website, select your favorite mango variety, and checkout — it’s that simple!

heading: Do you offer home delivery?
answer: Yes, we deliver fresh mangoes right to your doorstep in Lucknow.

heading: What are the available mango varieties
answer: We offer top-quality Dussehri, Langra, Chausa, and other Malihabadi mangoes.

heading: How long does delivery take?
answer: We usually ship within 30-40 min. Delivery time depends on your location.

heading: How are the mangoes packed for shipping?
answer: Our mangoes are packed in strong, ventilated boxes with natural hay for protection.

heading: Are the mangoes organic or naturally grown?
answer: Yes, our mangoes are grown using traditional, chemical-free methods in Malihabad.

heading: Can I pre-book mangoes before the season starts?
answer: Absolutely! You can pre-book on our website — we’ll notify you when they’re ready.
